language-python"><span><span>params = {
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"latitude"</span></span><span>: lat,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"longitude"</span></span><span>: lon,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"hourly"</span></span><span>: [</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"wave_height"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"wave_direction"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"wave_period"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"wind_speed"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"wind_direction"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"sea_surface_temperature"</span></span><span>],
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"start_date"</span></span><span>: start_date,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"end_date"</span></span><span>: end_date,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"timezone"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"auto"</span></span><span>
}
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="1514" data-end="1602">Pero <strong data-start="1519" data-end="1531">requests</strong> convertirá ese array en una cadena separada por comas igual que antes.</p>
<p data-start="1604" data-end="1693">Si la API no acepta esto, quizá tienes que hacer varias llamadas o pedir menos variables.</p>
<hr data-start="1695" data-end="1698">
<h2 data-start="1700" data-end="1756">3. Prueba pidiendo solo las variables básicas primero</h2>
<p data-start="1758" data-end="1779">Haz un test con solo:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="1781" data-end="1985"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-xs"><path d="M12.668 10.667C12.668 <h2 data-start="2215" data-end="2305">4. Alternativa: Usar la API básica de Open-Meteo para viento y temperatura (sin marine)</h2>
<p data-start="2307" data-end="2355">Si quieres evitar estos problemas, usa esta API:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="2357" data-end="2403"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center 2.0332 4.87891C1.88897 4.85446 1.7832 4.72938 1.7832 4.58301C1.78335 4.43673 1.88902 4.3115 2.0332 4.28711C2.72366 4.17203 3.22481 3.88861 3.58203 3.50391C3.94186 3.11638 4.17214 2.60888 4.28906 2.02441L4.30371 1.97363C4.34801 1.86052 4.45804 1.78333 4.58301 1.7832Z"></path></svg>Editar</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_basic_weather</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">lat, lon, start_date, end_date</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"https://api.open-meteo.com/v1/forecast"</span></span><span>
    params = {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"latitude"</span></span><span>: lat,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"longitude"</span></span><span>: lon,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"hourly"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"temperature_2m,wind_speed_10m,wind_direction_10m"</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"start_date"</span></span><span>: start_date,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"end_date"</span></span><span>: end_date,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"timezone"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"auto"</span></span><span>
    }
    response = requests.get(url, params=params)
    data = response.json()
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> data
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="3084" data-end="3087">
<h1 data-start="3089" data-end="3205" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">¿Quieres que adapte tu código para usar esta API más simple, mientras investigamos la correcta para datos marinos?</h1></div></div></div></div><div class="flex min-h-[46px] justify-start"><div class="touch:-me-2 touch:-ms-3.5 -ms-2.5 -me-1 flex flex-wrap items-center gap-y-4 p-1 select-none touch:w-[calc(100%+--spacing(3.5))] -mt-1 w-[calc(100%+--spacing(2.5))] duration-[1.5s] focus-within:transition-none hover:transition-none pointer-events-none <h2 data-start="178" data-end="229">Código básico para añadir el mapa en tu <code data-start="221" data-end="229">app.py</code></h2>
<p data-start="231" data-end="286">Justo después del selector de spots, añade este bloque:</p>

2.02441L4.30371 1.97363C4.34801 1.86052 4.45804 1.78333 4.58301 1.7832Z"></path></svg>Editar</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> pydeck </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> pdk

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Crear DataFrame con spots</span></span><span>
df_spots = pd.DataFrame([
    {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Spot"</span></span><span>: name, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"lat"</span></span><span>: coord[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>], </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"lon"</span></span><span>: coord[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>]} 
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> name, coord </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> SPOTS.items()
])

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Configuración del mapa centrado en Gran Canaria</span></span><span>
midpoint = (df_spots[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"lat"</span></span><span>].mean(), df_spots[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"lon"</span></span><span>].mean())

st.subheader(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"📍 Mapa de Spots de Surf en Gran Canaria"</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Mostrar mapa con marcadores</span></span><span>
st.pydeck_chart(pdk.Deck(
    map_style=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'mapbox://styles/mapbox/light-v9'</span></span><span>,
    initial_view_state=pdk.ViewState(
        latitude=midpoint[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>],
        longitude=midpoint[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>],
        zoom=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">11</span></span><span>,
        pitch=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>,
    ),
    layers=[
        pdk.Layer(
            </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'ScatterplotLayer'</span></span><span>,
            data=df_spots,
            get_position=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'[lon, lat]'</span></span><span>,
            get_color=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'[0, 128, 255, 160]'</span></span><span>,
            get_radius=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">300</span></span><span>,
            pickable=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>,
            auto_highlight=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>,
        )
    ],
    tooltip={</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"text"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"{Spot}"</span></span><span>}
))
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="1201" data-end="1204">
<h2 data-start="1206" data-end="1224">¿Qué hace esto?</h2>
<ul data-start="1226" data-end="1490">
<li data-start="1226" data-end="1279">
<p data-start="1228" data-end="1279">Crea un DataFrame con los spots y sus coordenadas</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1280" data-end="1356">
<p data-start="1282" data-end="1356">Centra el mapa en la media de las posiciones para que salga toda la isla</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1357" data-end="1422">
<p data-start="1359" data-end="1422">Añade un <strong data-start="1368" data-end="1388">ScatterplotLayer</strong> para mostrar los puntos en azul</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1423" data-end="1490">
<p data-start="1425" data-end="1490">Añade tooltip para mostrar el nombre del spot al pasar el ratón</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1492" data-end="1495">
<h2 data-start="1497" data-end="1517">Para que funcione</h2>
<ul data-start="1519" data-end="1688">
<li data-start="1519" data-end="1591">
<p data-start="1521" data-end="1591">Necesitas tener instalado <code data-start="1547" data-end="1555">pydeck</code> (normalmente viene con Streamlit)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1592" data-end="1688">
<p data-start="1594" data-end="1688">El mapa usa Mapbox, pero Streamlit ya gestiona la clave pública, no necesitas hacer nada extra</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1690" data-end="1693">
<p data-start="1695" data-end="1805" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">Si quieres, te genero el archivo completo <code data-start="1737" data-end="1745">app.py</code> con esta función ya data-scroll-anchor="false" style=""><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT Plus</h6><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto py-5 [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden" tabindex="-1"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn"><div class="relative flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="2ad896c7-2d19-4e68-9eb7-99b4f7bdccdc" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4-1-mini"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full break-words light"><p data-start="0" data-end="204">Eso suele pasar porque <strong data-start="23" data-end="132">pydeck usa Mapbox para el mapa base y necesita una clave de API (access token) válida para cargar el mapa</strong>, pero Streamlit no la proporciona automáticamente para mapas de Mapbox.</p>
<hr data-start="206" data-end="209">
<h2 data-start="211" data-end="231">Cómo solucionarlo</h2>
<h3 data-start="233" data-end="309">Opción 1: Usar un mapa base público alternativo (sin necesidad de token)</h3>
<p data-start="311" data-end="398">Puedes cambiar el <code data-start="329" data-end="340">map_style</code> por un estilo público que no necesite token, por ejemplo:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="400" data-end="490"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center <h3 data-start="1183" data-end="1227">Opción 2: Usar tu propio token de Mapbox</h3>
<p data-start="1229" data-end="1375">Si quieres usar el estilo oficial Mapbox y tienes cuenta en <a data-start="1289" data-end="1307" rel="noopener" target="_new" class="" href="https://mapbox.com/">https://mapbox.com</a>, obtén tu token y configúralo así antes de llamar a <code data-start="1360" data-end="1374">pydeck_chart</code>:</p>

<hr data-start="1456" data-end="1459">
<h3 data-start="1461" data-end="1479">Resumen rápido</h3>
<p data-start="1481" data-end="1591">Con solo cambiar el <code data-start="1501" data-end="1512">map_style</code> a uno público (opción 1) deberías ver el mapa base y los puntos sin problemas.</p>
<hr data-start="1593" data-end="1596">
<p data-start="1598" data-end="1687" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">¿Quieres que te prepare el código completo con ese cambio para que funcione directamente?</p></div></div></div></div><div class="flex min-h-[46px] justify-start"><div class="touch:-me-2 touch:-ms-3.5 -ms-2.5 -me-1 flex flex-wrap items-center gap-y-4 p-1 select-none touch:w-[calc(100%+--spacing(3.5))] -mt-1 <h2 data-start="158" data-end="186">¿Qué factores considerar?</h2>
<p data-start="188" data-end="250">Algunas variables típicas para buenas condiciones de surf son:</p>
<div class="_tableContainer_80l1q_1"><div tabindex="-1" class="_tableWrapper_80l1q_14 group flex w-fit flex-col-reverse"><table data-start="252" data-end="806" class="w-fit data-end="541"><td data-start="470" data-end="492" data-col-size="sm"><strong data-start="472" data-end="490">Periodo de ola</strong></td><td data-col-size="md" data-start="492" data-end="541">Más de ola</strong></td><td data-col-size="md" data-start="564" data-end="614">Dependiendo del spot (puede ajustarse)</td></tr><tr data-start="615" data-end="731"><td data-start="615" data-end="637" data-col-size="sm"><strong data-start="617" data-end="627">Viento</strong></td><td data-col-size="md" data-start="637" data-end="731">Preferible viento offshore (alejado de la costa, que limpia la ola), por ejemplo &lt; 15 km/h</td></tr><tr data-start="732" data-end="806"><td data-start="732" data-end="754" data-col-size="sm"><strong data-start="734" data-end="753">Temperatura 6.5V9.33301Z"></path></svg></button></span></div></div></div></div>
<hr data-start="808" data-end="811">
<h2 data-start="813" data-end="834">Cómo implementarlo</h2>
<ol data-start="836" data-end="1061">
<li data-start="836" data-end="1007">
<p data-start="839" data-end="1007">Añadimos una función que, dadas las condiciones actuales, devuelve un texto o semáforo (verde/amarillo/rojo) indicando si es “Ideal”, “Aceptable” o “Malo” para surfear.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1009" data-end="1061">
<p data-start="1012" data-end="1061">Lo mostramos en la app con colores y texto claro.</p>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="1063" data-end="1066">

2.02441L4.30371 1.97363C4.34801 1.86052 4.45804 1.78333 4.58301 1.7832Z"></path></svg>Editar</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">evaluar_condiciones</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">wave_height, wave_period, wind_speed</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Altura de ola</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> wave_height &lt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0.5</span></span><span>:
        altura = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Muy baja"</span></span><span>
        color_altura = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🔴"</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0.5</span></span><span> &lt;= wave_height &lt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1.0</span></span><span>:
        altura = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Baja"</span></span><span>
        color_altura = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🟠"</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1.0</span></span><span> &lt;= wave_height &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">3.0</span></span><span>:
        altura = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Ideal"</span></span><span>
        color_altura = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🟢"</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        altura = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Muy alta"</span></span><span>
        color_altura = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🟠"</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Periodo de ola</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> wave_period &lt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>:
        periodo = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Corto"</span></span><span>
        color_periodo = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🔴"</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span> &lt;= wave_period &lt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">8</span></span><span>:
        periodo = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Aceptable"</span></span><span>
        color_periodo = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🟠"</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        periodo = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Ideal"</span></span><span>
        color_periodo = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🟢"</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Viento</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> wind_speed &gt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">15</span></span><span>:
        viento = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Demasiado fuerte"</span></span><span>
        color_viento = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🔴"</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        viento = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Bueno"</span></span><span>
        color_viento = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🟢"</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> (</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{color_altura}</span></span></span><span> Altura: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{altura}</span></span><span>", </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{color_periodo}</span></span></span><span> Periodo: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{periodo}</span></span><span>", </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{color_viento}</span></span></span><span> Viento: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{viento}</span></span><span>")
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="2077" data-end="2080">
<h2 data-start="2082" data-end="2120">Cómo integrarlo en tu app (ejemplo)</h2>
<p data-start="2122" data-end="2210">En el bloque donde muestras las métricas actuales, después de calcular <code data-start="2193" data-end="2201">actual</code>, añades:</p>

st.markdown(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"### Indicadores de condiciones ideales"</span></span><span>)

@[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4-1-mini"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full break-words light"><p data-start="0" data-end="150">¡Perfecto! Vamos a crear un sistema de puntuación visual usando <strong data-start="64" data-end="84">5 tablas de surf</strong> para cada indicador, simulando una valoración tipo “5 estrellas”.</p>
<hr data-start="152" data-end="155">
<h2 data-start="157" data-end="172">Cómo hacerlo</h2>
<ol data-start="174" data-end="393">
<li data-start="174" data-end="241">
<p data-start="177" data-end="241">Usaremos el emoji 🏄 (tabla de surf) para mostrar la puntuación.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="242" data-end="326">
<p data-start="245" data-end="326">Definiremos una función que calcule una puntuación de 0 a 5 según cada indicador.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="327" data-end="393">
<p data-start="330" data-end="393">Mostraremos esa puntuación con las tablas de surf en Streamlit.</p>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="395" data-end="398">
<h2 data-start="400" data-end="461">Ejemplo de función para convertir puntuación a tablas surf</h2>

language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">surf_stars</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">score, max_score=<span class="hljs-number">5</span></span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># score es un float entre 0 y max_score</span></span><span>
    full = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(score)          </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># número de tablas completas</span></span><span>
    half = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> score - full &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0.5</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
    empty = max_score - full - half
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🏄"</span></span><span> * full + (</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🏄"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> half </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">""</span></span><span>) + </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"▫️"</span></span><span> * empty
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="760" data-end="842">Aquí <code data-start="765" data-end="769">▫️</code> es un cuadradito para tablas vacías (puedes cambiarlo o dejar espacios).</p>
<hr data-start="844" data-end="847">

class="hljs-params">altura</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> altura &lt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0.5</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> altura &lt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1.0</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> altura &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">3.0</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> altura &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">4.0</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">puntuar_periodo</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">periodo</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> periodo &lt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> periodo &lt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">8</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">puntuar_viento</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">viento</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> viento &gt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">20</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> viento &gt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">15</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> viento &gt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">8</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">4</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

st.markdown(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"### Indicadores de condiciones ideales para surf"</span></span><span>)
st.markdown(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"**Altura de ola:** <span class="hljs-subst">{surf_stars(alt_score)}</span></span></span><span>")

2.02441L4.30371 1.97363C4.34801 1.86052 4.45804 1.78333 4.58301 1.7832Z"></path></svg>Editar</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">surf_stars</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">score, max_score=<span class="hljs-number">5</span></span></span><span>):
    full = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(score)
    half = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> score - full &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0.5</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
    empty = max_score - full - half
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🌊"</span></span><span> * full + (</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🌊"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> half </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">""</span></span><span>) + </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"▫️"</span></span><span> * empty
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="477" data-end="480">
<p data-start="482" data-end="512">Y el resto igual, por ejemplo:</p>

class="text-token-text-primary w-full" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-47" data-scroll-anchor="false" style="scroll-margin-top: -6436px;"><h5 class="sr-only">Tú dijiste:</h5><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto py-5 [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden items-end rtl:items-start"><div class="relative max-w-[var(--user-chat-width,70%)] bg-token-message-surface rounded-3xl px-5 py-2.5"><div class="whitespace-pre-wrap">integralo aqui import streamlit as st
import requests
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px
from datetime import datetime, timedelta, timezone
import pydeck as pdk


# Coordenadas de los spots de surf
SPOTS = {
    "La Cícer": (28.13110735259434, -15.446698859594266),
    "El Confital": (28.1441, -15.4340),
    "La Laja": (28.0747, -15.4123),
    "San Andrés": (28.14670670936141, -15.555085904921604),
}

import pydeck as pdk

# Crear DataFrame con spots
df_spots = pd.DataFrame([
    {"Spot": name, "lat": coord[0], "lon": coord[1]} 
    for name, coord in SPOTS.items()
])

# Configuración del mapa centrado en Gran Canaria
midpoint = (df_spots["lat"].mean(), df_spots["lon"].mean())

st.subheader("📍 Mapa de Spots de Surf en Gran Canaria")

# Mostrar mapa con marcadores
st.pydeck_chart(pdk.Deck(
    map_style='https://basemaps.cartocdn.com/gl/dark-matter-gl-style/style.json',
    initial_view_state=pdk.ViewState(
        latitude=midpoint[0],
        longitude=midpoint[1],
        zoom=11,
        pitch=0,
    ),
    layers=[
        pdk.Layer(
            'ScatterplotLayer',
            data=df_spots,
            get_position='[lon, lat]',
            get_color='[0, 128, 255, 160]',
            get_radius=300,
            pickable=True,
            auto_highlight=True,
        )
    ],
    tooltip={"text": "{Spot}"}
))



# Función para obtener datos marinos
def get_wave_data(lat, lon, start_date, end_date):
    url = "https://marine-api.open-meteo.com/v1/marine"
    params = {
        "latitude": lat,
        "longitude": lon,
        "hourly": "wave_height,wind_wave_height,swell_wave_height,wind_wave_direction,swell_wave_period",
        "start_date": start_date,
        "end_date": end_date,
        "timezone": "auto"
    }
    response = requests.get(url, params=params)
    data = response.json()
    st.write("Datos crudos API marina:", data)  # Para debug
    if "hourly" not in data:
        st.error("No se encontraron datos horarios marinos en la respuesta de la API.")
        return pd.DataFrame()
    df = pd.DataFrame(data["hourly"])
    if df.empty:
        st.warning("El DataFrame marino está vacío.")
    else:
        df["time"] = pd.to_datetime(df["time"])
    return df

# Función para obtener datos meteorológicos (viento)
def get_weather_data(lat, lon, start_date, end_date):
    url = "https://api.open-meteo.com/v1/forecast"
    params = {
        "latitude": lat,
        "longitude": lon,
        "hourly": "windspeed_10m",
        "start": start_date,
        "end": end_date,
        "timezone": "auto"
    }
    response = requests.get(url, params=params)
    data = response.json()
    st.write("Datos crudos API meteorológica:", data)  # Para debug
    if "hourly" not in data:
        st.error("No se encontraron datos horarios meteorológicos en la respuesta de la API.")
        return pd.DataFrame()
    df = pd.DataFrame(data["hourly"])
    if df.empty:
        st.warning("El DataFrame meteorológico está vacío.")
    else:
        df["time"] = pd.to_datetime(df["time"])
    return df

# Interfaz Streamlit
st.set_page_config(page_title="Surf Dashboard - Canarias", layout="wide")
st.title("🏄 Surf Dashboard - Spots de Gran Canaria")

spot_name = st.selectbox("Selecciona un spot de surf:", list(SPOTS.keys()))
lat, lon = SPOTS[spot_name]

# Fechas: hoy y mañana
hoy = datetime.now(timezone.utc).date()
inicio = hoy.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")
fin = (hoy + timedelta(days=1)).strftime("%Y-%m-%d")

# Obtener datos
wave_data = get_wave_data(lat, lon, inicio, fin)
weather_data = get_weather_data(lat, lon, inicio, fin)

if wave_data.empty or weather_data.empty:
    st.warning("No se han encontrado datos suficientes para las fechas seleccionadas y el spot.")
else:
    # Unir datos por timestamp (time)
    combined = pd.merge(wave_data, weather_data, on="time", how="inner")

    # Mostrar resumen actual (última fila)
    actual = combined.iloc[-1]
    col1, col2, col3 = st.columns(3)
    col1.metric("Altura de ola", f"{actual['wave_height']:.2f} m")
    col2.metric("Viento (10m)", f"{actual['windspeed_10m']:.1f} km/h")
    # Como la API no tiene temp del mar directa, omitimos o usar swell_wave_height o similar
    col3.metric("Altura ola swell", f"{actual['swell_wave_height']:.2f} m")

    # Mostrar gráficos
    st.subheader("📈 Evolución de las condiciones marinas y meteorológicas (48h)")
    fig1 = px.line(combined, x="time", y="wave_height", title="Altura de las olas (m)")
    fig2 = px.line(combined, x="time", y="swell_wave_period", title="Periodo de las olas swell (s)")
    fig3 = px.line(combined, x="time", y="windspeed_10m", title="Velocidad del viento a 10m (km/h)")

    st.plotly_chart(fig1, use_container_width=True)
    st.plotly_chart(fig2, use_container_width=True)
    st.plotly_chart(fig3, use_container_width=True)

st.caption("Datos obtenidos desde la API de Open-Meteo: https://open-meteo.com")</div></div></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-end"><div class="touch:-me-2 touch:-ms-3.5 -ms-2.5 -me-1 flex flex-wrap items-center gap-y-4 p-1 select-none focus-within:transition-none hover:transition-none duration-300 group-hover/turn-messages:delay-300 pointer-events-none opacity-0 motion-safe:transition-opacity group-hover/turn-messages:pointer-events-auto group-hover/turn-messages:opacity-100 group-focus-within/turn-messages:pointer-events-auto group-focus-within/turn-messages:opacity-100 has-data-[state=open]:pointer-events-auto has-data-[state=open]:opacity-100" style="mask-position: 0% 0%;"><button class="text-token-text-secondary hover:bg-token-bg-secondary rounded-lg" aria-label="Copiar" aria-selected="false" data-testid="copy-turn-action-button" data-state="closed"><span class="touch:w-10 flex h-8 w-8 items-center justify-center"><svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon"><path d="M12.668 10.667C12.668 9.95614 12.668 9.46258 12.6367 9.0791C12.6137 8.79732 12.5758 8.60761 12.5244 8.46387L12.4688 8.33399C12.3148 8.03193 12.0803 7.77885 11.793 7.60254L11.666 7.53125C11.508 7.45087 11.2963 7.39395 10.9209 7.36328C10.5374 7.33197 language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> streamlit </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> st
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> requests
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> pandas </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> pd
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> plotly.express </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> px
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> datetime </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> datetime, timedelta, timezone
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> pydeck </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> pdk


</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Coordenadas de los spots de surf</span></span><span>
SPOTS = {
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"La Cícer"</span></span><span>: (</span><span><span class="hljs-number">28.13110735259434</span></span><span>, -</span><span><span class="hljs-number">15.446698859594266</span></span><span>),
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"El Confital"</span></span><span>: (</span><span><span class="hljs-number">28.1441</span></span><span>, -</span><span><span class="hljs-number">15.4340</span></span><span>),
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"La Laja"</span></span><span>: (</span><span><span class="hljs-number">28.0747</span></span><span>, -</span><span><span class="hljs-number">15.4123</span></span><span>),
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"San Andrés"</span></span><span>: (</span><span><span class="hljs-number">28.14670670936141</span></span><span>, -</span><span><span class="hljs-number">15.555085904921604</span></span><span>),
}

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Crear DataFrame con spots</span></span><span>
df_spots = pd.DataFrame([
    {</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Spot"</span></span><span>: name, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"lat"</span></span><span>: coord[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>], </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"lon"</span></span><span>: coord[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>]} 
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> name, coord </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> SPOTS.items()
])

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Configuración del mapa centrado en Gran Canaria</span></span><span>
midpoint = (df_spots[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"lat"</span></span><span>].mean(), df_spots[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"lon"</span></span><span>].mean())

st.subheader(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"📍 Mapa de Spots de Surf en Gran Canaria"</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Mostrar mapa con marcadores</span></span><span>
st.pydeck_chart(pdk.Deck(
    map_style=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'https://basemaps.cartocdn.com/gl/dark-matter-gl-style/style.json'</span></span><span>,
    initial_view_state=pdk.ViewState(
        latitude=midpoint[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>],
        longitude=midpoint[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>],
        zoom=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">11</span></span><span>,
        pitch=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>,
    ),
    layers=[
        pdk.Layer(
            </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'ScatterplotLayer'</span></span><span>,
            data=df_spots,
            get_position=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'[lon, lat]'</span></span><span>,
            get_color=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'[0, 128, 255, 160]'</span></span><span>,
            get_radius=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">300</span></span><span>,
            pickable=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>,
            auto_highlight=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>,
        )
    ],
    tooltip={</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"text"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"{Spot}"</span></span><span>}
))


</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Función para obtener datos marinos</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_wave_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">lat, lon, start_date, end_date</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"https://marine-api.open-meteo.com/v1/marine"</span></span><span>
    params = {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"latitude"</span></span><span>: lat,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"longitude"</span></span><span>: lon,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"hourly"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"wave_height,wind_wave_height,swell_wave_height,wind_wave_direction,swell_wave_period"</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"start_date"</span></span><span>: start_date,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"end_date"</span></span><span>: end_date,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"timezone"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"auto"</span></span><span>
    }
    response = requests.get(url, params=params)
    data = response.json()
    st.write(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Datos crudos API marina:"</span></span><span>, data)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Para debug</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"hourly"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data:
        st.error(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No se encontraron datos horarios marinos en la respuesta de la API."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> pd.DataFrame()
    df = pd.DataFrame(data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"hourly"</span></span><span>])
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> df.empty:
        st.warning(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"El DataFrame marino está vacío."</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        df[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"time"</span></span><span>] = pd.to_datetime(df[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"time"</span></span><span>])
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> df

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Función para obtener datos meteorológicos (viento)</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_weather_data</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">lat, lon, start_date, end_date</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"https://api.open-meteo.com/v1/forecast"</span></span><span>
    params = {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"latitude"</span></span><span>: lat,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"longitude"</span></span><span>: lon,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"hourly"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"windspeed_10m"</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"start"</span></span><span>: start_date,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"end"</span></span><span>: end_date,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"timezone"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"auto"</span></span><span>
    }
    response = requests.get(url, params=params)
    data = response.json()
    st.write(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Datos crudos API meteorológica:"</span></span><span>, data)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Para debug</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"hourly"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data:
        st.error(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No se encontraron datos horarios meteorológicos en la respuesta de la API."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> pd.DataFrame()
    df = pd.DataFrame(data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"hourly"</span></span><span>])
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> df.empty:
        st.warning(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"El DataFrame meteorológico está vacío."</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        df[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"time"</span></span><span>] = pd.to_datetime(df[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"time"</span></span><span>])
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> df

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Funciones para puntuar condiciones (0 a 5)</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">puntuar_altura</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">altura</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> altura &lt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0.5</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> altura &lt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1.0</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> altura &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">3.0</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> altura &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">4.0</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">puntuar_periodo</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">periodo</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> periodo &lt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> periodo &lt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">8</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">puntuar_viento</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">viento</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> viento &gt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">20</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> viento &gt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">15</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> viento &gt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">8</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">4</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Función para mostrar olas 🌊 como puntuación visual</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">surf_stars</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">score, max_score=<span class="hljs-number">5</span></span></span><span>):
    full = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(score)
    half = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> score - full &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0.5</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
    empty = max_score - full - half
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🌊"</span></span><span> * full + (</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🌊"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> half </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">""</span></span><span>) + </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"▫️"</span></span><span> * empty


</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Interfaz Streamlit</span></span><span>
st.set_page_config(page_title=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Surf Dashboard - Canarias"</span></span><span>, layout=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"wide"</span></span><span>)
st.title(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🏄 Surf Dashboard - Spots de Gran Canaria"</span></span><span>)

spot_name = st.selectbox(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Selecciona un spot de surf:"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">list</span></span><span>(SPOTS.keys()))
lat, lon = SPOTS[spot_name]

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Fechas: hoy y mañana</span></span><span>
hoy = datetime.now(timezone.utc).date()
inicio = hoy.strftime(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"%Y-%m-%d"</span></span><span>)
fin = (hoy + timedelta(days=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>)).strftime(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"%Y-%m-%d"</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Obtener datos</span></span><span>
wave_data = get_wave_data(lat, lon, inicio, fin)
weather_data = get_weather_data(lat, lon, inicio, fin)

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> wave_data.empty </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">or</span></span><span> weather_data.empty:
    st.warning(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No se han encontrado datos suficientes para las fechas seleccionadas y el spot."</span></span><span>)
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Unir datos por timestamp (time)</span></span><span>
    combined = pd.merge(wave_data, weather_data, on=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"time"</span></span><span>, how=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"inner"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Mostrar resumen actual (última fila)</span></span><span>
    actual = combined.iloc[-</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>]
    col1, col2, col3 = st.columns(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>)
    col1.metric(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Altura de ola"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{actual[<span class="hljs-string">'wave_height'</span></span></span></span><span>]:</span><span><span class="hljs-number">.2</span></span><span>f} m")
    col2.metric(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Viento (10m)"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{actual[<span class="hljs-string">'windspeed_10m'</span></span></span></span><span>]:</span><span><span class="hljs-number">.1</span></span><span>f} km/h")
    col3.metric(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Altura ola swell"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{actual[<span class="hljs-string">'swell_wave_height'</span></span></span></span><span>]:</span><span><span class="hljs-number">.2</span></span><span>f} m")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Mostrar indicadores con olas 🌊</span></span><span>
    alt_score = puntuar_altura(actual[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'wave_height'</span></span><span>])
    per_score = puntuar_periodo(actual[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'swell_wave_period'</span></span><span>])
    vin_score = puntuar_viento(actual[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'windspeed_10m'</span></span><span>])

    st.markdown(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"### Indicadores de condiciones ideales para surf"</span></span><span>)
    st.markdown(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"**Altura de ola:** <span class="hljs-subst">{surf_stars(alt_score)}</span></span></span><span>")
    st.markdown(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"**Periodo de ola:** <span class="hljs-subst">{surf_stars(per_score)}</span></span></span><span>")
    st.markdown(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"**Viento:** <span class="hljs-subst">{surf_stars(vin_score)}</span></span></span><span>")

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Mostrar gráficos</span></span><span>
    st.subheader(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"📈 Evolución de las condiciones marinas y meteorológicas (48h)"</span></span><span>)
    fig1 = px.line(combined, x=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"time"</span></span><span>, y=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"wave_height"</span></span><span>, title=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Altura de las olas (m)"</span></span><span>)
    fig2 = px.line(combined, x=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"time"</span></span><span>, y=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"swell_wave_period"</span></span><span>, title=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Periodo de las olas swell (s)"</span></span><span>)
    fig3 = px.line(combined, x=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"time"</span></span><span>, y=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"windspeed_10m"</span></span><span>, title=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Velocidad del viento a 10m (km/h)"</span></span><span>)

    st.plotly_chart(fig1, use_container_width=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
    st.plotly_chart(fig2, use_container_width=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
    st.plotly_chart(fig3, use_container_width=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)

st.caption(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Datos obtenidos desde la API de Open-Meteo: https://open-meteo.com"</span></span><span>)
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="6158" data-end="6161">
<h3 data-start="6163" data-end="6180">Lo que añadí:</h3>
<ul data-start="6181" data-end="6360">
<li data-start="6181" data-end="6234">
<p data-start="6183" data-end="6234">Funciones para puntuar la altura, periodo y viento.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="6235" data-end="6298">
<p data-start="6237" data-end="6298">Función <code data-start="6245" data-end="6257">surf_stars</code> que muestra las olas 🌊 como puntuación.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="6299" data-end="6360">
<p data-start="6301" data-end="6360">Indicadores visuales justo debajo de las métricas actuales.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="6362" data-end="6439" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">Pruébalo y dime qué tal. ¿Quieres que añadamos algún otro indicador o mejora?</p></div></div></div></div><div class="flex dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-50" data-scroll-anchor="false" style=""><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT Plus</h6><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto py-5 [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden" tabindex="-1"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn"><div class="relative flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="e53fbcce-39e6-429f-9505-14bfa3a900b7" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4-1-mini"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full break-words light"><p data-start="0" data-end="121">¡Genial que ya tengas la base! Aquí van algunas ideas para mejorar y hacer tu panel más útil e impactante para surfistas:</p>
<hr data-start="123" data-end="126">
<h3 data-start="128" data-end="184">1. <strong data-start="135" data-end="182">Condiciones óptimas personalizadas por spot</strong></h3>
<p data-start="185" data-end="427">Los spots tienen orientaciones y características distintas, así que podrías adaptar la evaluación de viento y dirección de ola para cada spot. Ejemplo: para un spot que funciona mejor con viento offshore del este, que sea una condición ideal.</p>
<hr data-start="429" data-end="432">
<h3 data-start="434" data-end="487">2. <strong data-start="441" data-end="485">Incluir dirección del viento y de la ola</strong></h3>
<p data-start="488" data-end="628">Mostrar la dirección en grados y con flechas o compases, que ayuda mucho a los surfistas a saber si el viento “limpia” la ola o la estropea.</p>
<hr data-start="630" data-end="633">
<h3 data-start="635" data-end="672">3. <strong data-start="642" data-end="670">Alertas y notificaciones</strong></h3>
<p data-start="673" data-end="808">Que el panel avise con colores o mensajes cuando las condiciones sean ideales o peligrosas (olas demasiado grandes, viento muy fuerte).</p>
<hr data-start="810" data-end="813">
<h3 data-start="815" data-end="851">4. <strong data-start="822" data-end="849">Comparativa entre spots</strong></h3>
<p data-start="852" data-end="971">Mostrar en un mismo gráfico o tabla qué spots tienen mejores condiciones en ese momento para facilitar elegir dónde ir.</p>
<hr data-start="973" data-end="976">
<h3 data-start="978" data-end="1018">5. <strong data-start="985" data-end="1016">Pronóstico para varios días</strong></h3>
<p data-start="1019" data-end="1134">Mostrar una previsión no solo para el día actual, sino para los próximos 3-5 días con un resumen fácil de entender.</p>
<hr data-start="1136" data-end="1139">
<h3 data-start="1141" data-end="1176">6. <strong data-start="1148" data-end="1174">Integración con mareas</strong></h3>
<p data-start="1177" data-end="1276">La marea afecta mucho a la calidad del surf. Añadir datos de mareas para cada spot puede ser clave.</p>
<hr data-start="1278" data-end="1281">
<h3 data-start="1283" data-end="1315">7. <strong data-start="1290" data-end="1313">Modo oscuro / claro</strong></h3>
<p data-start="1316" data-end="1397">Permitir cambiar el tema visual para mayor comodidad según la hora o preferencia.</p>
<hr data-start="1399" data-end="1402">
<h3 data-start="1404" data-end="1444">8. <strong data-start="1411" data-end="1442">Mapa con capas interactivas</strong></h3>
<p data-start="1445" data-end="1592">Mostrar en el mapa no solo los puntos, sino también capas con datos como temperatura del mar, altura de olas, o incluso webcams si hay disponibles.</p>
<hr data-start="1594" data-end="1597">
<h3 data-start="1599" data-end="1632">9. <strong data-start="1606" data-end="1630">Historial y análisis</strong></h3>
<p data-start="1633" data-end="1743">Permitir que el usuario vea datos históricos y patrones, para entender cuándo suele haber mejores condiciones.</p>
<hr data-start="1745" data-end="1748">
<h3 data-start="1750" data-end="1782">10. <strong data-start="1758" data-end="1780">Optimización móvil</strong></h3>
<p data-start="1783" data-end="1878">Que el panel se vea bien y sea usable desde móviles, muy importante para surfistas en la playa.</p>
<hr data-start="1880" data-end="1883">
<p data-start="1885" data-end="1985" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">Si quieres, podemos ir haciendo paso a paso alguna de estas mejoras. ¿Cuál te llama más la atención?</p></div></div></div></div><div class="flex min-h-[46px] justify-start"><div class="touch:-me-2 touch:-ms-3.5 -ms-2.5 -me-1 flex flex-wrap items-center gap-y-4 p-1 select-none Vamos por partes. Te propongo primero la <strong data-start="52" data-end="79">comparativa entre spots</strong> con una tabla y/o gráfico sencillo, y después la <strong data-start="129" data-end="163">integración de datos de mareas</strong>.</p>
<hr data-start="166" data-end="169">
<h2 data-start="171" data-end="200">1. Comparativa entre spots</h2>
<h3 data-start="202" data-end="211">Idea:</h3>
<ul data-start="212" data-end="424">
<li data-start="212" data-end="299">
<p data-start="214" data-end="299">Para cada spot, sacamos las condiciones actuales (altura ola, viento, periodo, etc.).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="300" data-end="360">
<p data-start="302" data-end="360">Mostramos una tabla resumen con la puntuación en cada uno.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="361" data-end="424">
<p data-start="363" data-end="424">Opcional: gráfico de barras comparando altura o puntuaciones.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="426" data-end="452">Implementación básica:</h3>

4.22517 12.6732 4.3584 12.3096L4.45117 12.0791C4.55073 11.8521 4.67152 11.6346 4.81152 11.4297L4.9873 11.1953C5.17772 10.9632 5.4146 10.728 5.73828 10.4043L12.0303 4.11328ZM6.67871 11.3447C6.32926 11.6942 6.14542 11.8803 6.01953 12.0332L5.90918 12.1797C5.81574 12.3165 5.73539 12.4618 5.66895 12.6133L5.60742 12.7666C5.52668 12.9869 5.48332 13.229 5.375 13.8789L4.97656 16.2725L4.97559 16.2744H4.97852L7.37207 15.875L8.08887 15.749C8.25765 15.7147 8.37336 15.6839 8.4834 15.6436L8.63672 15.5811C8.78817 15.5146 8.93356 15.4342 9.07031 15.3408L9.2168 15.2305C9.36965 15.1046 9.55583 17.0869 5.94456 16.1963 5.05371Z"></path><path d="M4.58301 1.7832C4.72589 1.7832 4.84877 1.88437 4.87695 2.02441C4.99384 2.60873 5.22432 3.11642 5.58398 3.50391C5.94115 3.88854 6.44253 4.172 7.13281 4.28711C7.27713 4.3114 7.38267 4.43665 7.38281 4.58301C7.38281 4.7295 7.27723 4.8546 7.13281 4.87891C6.44249 4.99401 5.94116 5.27746 5.58398 5.66211C5.26908 6.00126 5.05404 6.43267 4.92676 6.92676L4.87695 7.1416C4.84891 7.28183 4.72601 7.38281 4.58301 7.38281C4.44013 7.38267 4.31709 7.28173 4.28906 7.1416C4.17212 6.55728 3.94179 6.04956 3.58203 5.66211C3.22483 5.27757 2.72347 4.99395 2.0332 4.87891C1.88897 4.85446 1.7832 4.72938 1.7832 4.58301C1.78335 4.43673 1.88902 4.3115 2.0332 4.28711C2.72366 4.17203 3.22481 3.88861 3.58203 3.50391C3.94186 3.11638 4.17214 2.60888 4.28906 2.02441L4.30371 1.97363C4.34801 1.86052 4.45804 1.78333 4.58301 1.7832Z"></path></svg>Editar</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">obtener_puntuacion_spot</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">lat, lon, fecha_inicio, fecha_fin</span></span><span>):
    wave = get_wave_data(lat, lon, fecha_inicio, fecha_fin)
    weather = get_weather_data(lat, lon, fecha_inicio, fecha_fin)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> wave.empty </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">or</span></span><span> weather.empty:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">None</span></span><span>
    df = pd.merge(wave, weather, on=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"time"</span></span><span>, how=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"inner"</span></span><span>)
    actual = df.iloc[-</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>]
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Altura"</span></span><span>: actual[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'wave_height'</span></span><span>],
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Periodo"</span></span><span>: actual[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'swell_wave_period'</span></span><span>],
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Viento"</span></span><span>: actual[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'windspeed_10m'</span></span><span>],
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Punt. Altura"</span></span><span>: puntuar_altura(actual[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'wave_height'</span></span><span>]),
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Punt. Periodo"</span></span><span>: puntuar_periodo(actual[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'swell_wave_period'</span></span><span>]),
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Punt. Viento"</span></span><span>: puntuar_viento(actual[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'windspeed_10m'</span></span><span>]),
    }

comparativa = []
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> spot, (lat, lon) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> SPOTS.items():
    datos = obtener_puntuacion_spot(lat, lon, inicio, fin)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> datos:
        datos[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Spot"</span></span><span>] = spot
        comparativa.append(datos)

df_comparativa = pd.DataFrame(comparativa).set_index(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Spot"</span></span><span>)

st.subheader(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🏄 Comparativa de condiciones actuales entre spots"</span></span><span>)
st.dataframe(df_comparativa.style.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">format</span></span><span>({
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Altura"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"{:.2f} m"</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Periodo"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"{:.1f} s"</span></span><span>,
    </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Viento"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"{:.1f} km/h"</span></span><span>
}))
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="1598" data-end="1660">Esto genera una tabla con datos y puntuaciones para cada spot.</p>
<hr data-start="1662" data-end="1665">
<h2 data-start="1667" data-end="1695">2. Integración con mareas</h2>
<h3 data-start="1697" data-end="1738">Fuentes de datos de mareas gratuitas:</h3>
<ul data-start="1740" data-end="1904">
<li data-start="1740" data-end="1836">
<p data-start="1742" data-end="1836">Puedes usar APIs como <a data-start="1764" data-end="1810" class="" rel="noopener" target="_new" href="https://www.worldtides.info/">WorldTides API</a> (requiere clave gratuita)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1837" data-end="1904">
<p data-start="1839" data-end="1904">O servicios locales si existen (puertos de Canarias, AEMET, etc.)</p>
</li>
</ul>

2.02441L4.30371 1.97363C4.34801 1.86052 4.45804 1.78333 4.58301 1.7832Z"></path></svg>Editar</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_tides</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">lat, lon, fecha_inicio, fecha_fin</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"https://www.worldtides.info/api/v3"</span></span><span>
    params = {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"heights"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">""</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"lat"</span></span><span>: lat,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"lon"</span></span><span>: lon,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"start"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(datetime.strptime(fecha_inicio, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"%Y-%m-%d"</span></span><span>).timestamp()),
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"end"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(datetime.strptime(fecha_fin, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"%Y-%m-%d"</span></span><span>).timestamp()),
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"key"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"TU_API_KEY"</span></span><span>
    }
    resp = requests.get(url, params=params)
    data = resp.json()
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"heights"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> data:
        df = pd.DataFrame(data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"heights"</span></span><span>])
        df[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"date"</span></span><span>] = pd.to_datetime(df[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"date"</span></span><span>])
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> df
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        st.error(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No se pudieron obtener datos de mareas."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> pd.DataFrame()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="2621" data-end="2702">Luego lo puedes integrar igual que con olas y viento, mostrando gráfica de marea.</p>
<hr data-start="2704" data-end="2707">
<h3 data-start="2709" data-end="2805">¿Quieres que te prepare el código completo integrando estas dos funcionalidades en tu app?</h3>
<p data-start="2806" data-end="2857" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">¿O prefieres que empecemos por una y luego la otra?</p></div></div></div></div><div class="flex min-h-[46px] justify-start"><div class="touch:-me-2 touch:-ms-3.5 -ms-2.5 -me-1 flex flex-wrap items-center gap-y-4 p-1 select-none touch:w-[calc(100%+--spacing(3.5))] -mt-1 w-[calc(100%+--spacing(2.5))] <h2 data-start="247" data-end="279">📊 1. Comparativa entre spots</h2>
<p data-start="281" data-end="306">Añadiremos una tabla con:</p>
<ul data-start="308" data-end="385">
<li data-start="308" data-end="349">
<p data-start="310" data-end="349">Altura de ola, periodo, viento actuales</p>
</li>
<li data-start="350" data-end="385">
<p data-start="352" data-end="385">Puntuaciones (0–5 estrellas/olas)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="387" data-end="454">Este es el bloque que deberás incluir después de obtener los datos:</p>

4.28711C7.27713 4.3114 7.38267 4.43665 7.38281 4.58301C7.38281 4.7295 7.27723 4.8546 7.13281 4.87891C6.44249 4.99401 5.94116 5.27746 5.58398 5.66211C5.26908 6.00126 5.05404 6.43267 4.92676 2.0332 4.87891C1.88897 4.85446 1.7832 4.72938 1.7832 4.58301C1.78335 4.43673 1.88902 4.3115 2.0332 4.28711C2.72366 4.17203 3.22481 3.88861 3.58203 3.50391C3.94186 3.11638 4.17214 2.60888 4.28906 2.02441L4.30371 1.97363C4.34801 1.86052 4.45804 1.78333 4.58301 1.7832Z"></path></svg>Editar</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># --- Comparativa entre spots ---</span></span><span>
comparativa = []
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> spot, (slat, slon) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> SPOTS.items():
    wave = get_wave_data(slat, slon, inicio, fin)
    weather = get_weather_data(slat, slon, inicio, fin)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> wave.empty </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">or</span></span><span> weather.empty:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">continue</span></span><span>
    df_sp = pd.merge(wave, weather, on=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"time"</span></span><span>, how=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"inner"</span></span><span>)
    actual_sp = df_sp.iloc[-</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>]
    comparativa.append({
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Spot"</span></span><span>: spot,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Altura (m)"</span></span><span>: actual_sp[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"wave_height"</span></span><span>],
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Periodo (s)"</span></span><span>: actual_sp[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"swell_wave_period"</span></span><span>],
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Viento (km/h)"</span></span><span>: actual_sp[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"windspeed_10m"</span></span><span>],
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"⭐ Altura"</span></span><span>: puntuar_altura(actual_sp[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"wave_height"</span></span><span>]),
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"⭐ Periodo"</span></span><span>: puntuar_periodo(actual_sp[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"swell_wave_period"</span></span><span>]),
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"⭐ Viento"</span></span><span>: puntuar_viento(actual_sp[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"windspeed_10m"</span></span><span>]),
    })

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> comparativa:
    df_comp = pd.DataFrame(comparativa).set_index(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Spot"</span></span><span>)
    st.subheader(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🏄 Comparativa actual entre spots"</span></span><span>)
    st.dataframe(df_comp.style.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">format</span></span><span>({
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Altura (m)"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"{:.2f}"</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Periodo (s)"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"{:.1f}"</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Viento (km/h)"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"{:.1f}"</span></span><span>
    }))
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
    st.warning(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No se pudieron obtener datos para todos los spots."</span></span><span>)
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="1570" data-end="1573">
<h2 data-start="1575" data-end="1631">🌊 2. Integración de mareas usando Puertos del Estado</h2>
<p data-start="1633" data-end="1785">La API de Puertos del Estado ofrece previsión de nivel del mar (mareas) por puerto. Podemos extraer la más cercana al spot (Las Palmas) con estos datos:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="1787" data-end="2188"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">get_tides</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">lat, lon</span></span><span>):
    url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"https://www.puertos.es/es/servicios/oceanografia/Portus/DataService.asmx/GetTideModel"</span></span><span>
    params = {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"st"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Las Palmas"</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ini"</span></span><span>: inicio,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"end"</span></span><span>: fin
    }
    resp = requests.get(url, params=params)
    data = resp.json()
    df = pd.DataFrame(data[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"TideModel"</span></span><span>])
    df[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"datetime"</span></span><span>] = pd.to_datetime(df[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"datetime"</span></span><span>])
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> df
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="2190" data-end="2273">E integraremos lo siguiente abajo en el bloque <code data-start="2237" data-end="2244">else:</code> donde ya mostramos gráficos:</p>

st.subheader(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🌙 Mareas para hoy"</span></span><span>)

</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<h2 data-start="2513" data-end="2536">✅ Resumen de mejoras</h2>
<ul data-start="2538" data-end="2766">
<li data-start="2538" data-end="2601">
<p data-start="2540" data-end="2601"><strong data-start="2540" data-end="2561">Tabla comparativa</strong> de condiciones y puntuaciones por spot.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2602" data-end="2687">
<p data-start="2604" data-end="2687"><strong data-start="2604" data-end="2625">Gráfico de mareas</strong> para el spot seleccionado usando datos de Puertos del Estado.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2688" data-end="2766">
<p data-start="2690" data-end="2766">Visualización clara que ayuda a surfistas a elegir mejor el lugar y momento.</p>
</li>
</ul>

</li>
</ol>

<h2 data-start="121" data-end="163">1️⃣ Usar Puertos del Estado (sin clave)</h2>
<p data-start="164" data-end="201"><span class="relative -mx-px my-[-0.2rem] rounded px-px py-[0.2rem] transition-colors duration-100 ease-in-out">Son datos fiables para niveles de mar (mareas), gratuitos y sin necesidad de registro. Podemos integrarlos fácilmente.</span></p>

2.0332 4.87891C1.88897 4.85446 1.7832 4.72938 1.7832 4.58301C1.78335 4.43673 1.88902 4.3115 2.0332 4.28711C2.72366 4.17203 3.22481 3.88861 3.58203 3.50391C3.94186 3.11638 4.17214 2.60888 4.28906
